疫苗影响：BNT162b2 和 5 岁以下儿童的儿科 COVID-19 门诊就诊BNT162b2 疫苗与 (COVID-19) 相关门诊就诊之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Vaccine-impact-BNT162b2-and-pediatric-COVID-19-ambulatory-visits-in-kids-under-5.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Vaccine-impact-BNT162b2-and-pediatric-COVID-19-ambulatory-visits-in-kids-under-5.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d92b4f8-3952-4f32-b016-e54069719f34 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 06:46:00 -0400 Vaccine impact: BNT162b2 and pediatric COVID-19 ambulatory visits in kids under 5
在医疗补助计划放松期间，美国农村地区的情况如何？专家担心他们只能靠自己艾比·马多雷 (Abby Madore) 每天在工作中都会涉及很多工作。内华达州卡森市马多尔市社区卫生中心的一名工作人员每天帮助低收入居民了解他们的健康保险选择，包括医疗补助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/How-will-rural-Americans-fare-during-Medicaid-unwinding-Experts-fear-theye28099re-on-their-own.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/How-will-rural-Americans-fare-during-Medicaid-unwinding-Experts-fear-theye28099re-on-their-own.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=532a7612-d175-4140-a559-b82b3c190180 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 06:40:31 -0400 How will rural Americans fare during Medicaid unwinding? Experts fear they’re on their own
杆状病毒-昆虫细胞表达系统的创新杆状病毒-昆虫细胞表达系统（昆虫细胞与杆状病毒表达载体系统（BEVS）结合使用）仍然是制造大型复杂蛋白质的关键技术。该真核表达系统具有固有的安全性、易于放大、灵活的产品设计以及多种蛋白质的多功能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Innovations-in-baculovirus-insect-cell-express-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Innovations-in-baculovirus-insect-cell-express-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f9bc44e-6911-492a-9fdd-6817d34e5ce3 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 06:34:00 -0400 Innovations in baculovirus–insect cell expression systems

亚克隆新抗原是 MMRd 肿瘤免疫治疗成功的关键障碍研究人员评估了免疫检查点阻断（ICB）疗法的敏感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Subclonal-neoantigens-a-key-roadblock-in-MMRd-tumor-immunotherapy-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Subclonal-neoantigens-a-key-roadblock-in-MMRd-tumor-immunotherapy-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cccacc27-b165-4bb0-b98a-36e4d0fc9172 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 05:00:00 -0400 Subclonal neoantigens present a key roadblock in MMRd tumor immunotherapy success
减少光照可以帮助您在怀孕期间睡得更好并改善心理健康吗？夜间较高的光照和较差的睡眠质量与较差的心理健康结果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Could-reducing-light-exposure-help-you-sleep-better-and-improve-your-mental-health-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Could-reducing-light-exposure-help-you-sleep-better-and-improve-your-mental-health-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1466827e-56aa-4af1-aca1-18a6cb866baa Wed, 20 Sep 2023 04:13:00 -0400 Could reducing light exposure help you sleep better and improve your mental health during pregnancy?
Cell Signaling Technology 与 Beyond Benign 合作推进绿色化学教育Cell Signaling Technology (CST) 是一家生命科学发现技术公司，也是抗体、试剂盒和服务的领先供应商，今天宣布与全球绿色化学教育非营利组织 Beyond Benign 建立合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Cell-Signaling-Technology-and-Beyond-Benign-collaborate-to-advance-green-chemistry-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Cell-Signaling-Technology-and-Beyond-Benign-collaborate-to-advance-green-chemistry-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd0f0d6a-6872-4272-a598-262e6ed7b794 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 04:06:00 -0400 Cell Signaling Technology and Beyond Benign collaborate to advance green chemistry education
CST 和 Leica Biosystems 联手开发个性化医疗伴随诊断Cell Signaling Technology (CST) 是一家生命科学发现技术公司，也是抗体、试剂盒和服务的领先供应商，它与自动染色、明场和荧光成像领域的技术领导者 Leica Biosystems 合作，支持伴随诊断的开发。 CDx）检测使用来自 CST 的广泛的一流抗体组合，经过免疫组织化学 (IHC) 验证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/CST-and-Leica-Biosystems-join-forces-to-develop-companion-diagnostics-for-personalized-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/CST-and-Leica-Biosystems-join-forces-to-develop-companion-diagnostics-for-personalized-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af2f375e-ecee-4e4d-9ede-8d383cf8e130 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 04:05:00 -0400 CST and Leica Biosystems join forces to develop companion diagnostics for personalized medicine
研究人员挑战世卫组织甜味剂指南，呼吁紧急重新评估研究人员质疑世卫组织关于非糖甜味剂的指南，理由是其依赖于有偏见的前瞻性队列研究而不是随机对照试验。该研究呼吁紧急重新评估世卫组织的立场，因为最近的证据表明非糖甜味剂实际上可能会降低心脏代谢风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Researchers-challenge-WHOs-sweetener-guidelines-call-for-urgent-re-evaluation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Researchers-challenge-WHOs-sweetener-guidelines-call-for-urgent-re-evaluation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18833f21-2f8e-477c-be50-9ed3877c13f0 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 23:56:00 -0400 Researchers challenge WHO's sweetener guidelines, call for urgent re-evaluation
三氯蔗糖是对肠道健康更安全的甜味剂吗？研究发现，饮用含蔗糖的饮料会显着增加血液中细菌内毒素的水平，这是炎症和肠道屏障功能障碍的标志，而含三氯蔗糖的饮料则没有观察到这种影响。研究结果表明，就肠道健康和炎症而言，三氯蔗糖可能是蔗糖更安全的替代品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Is-sucralose-the-safer-sweetener-for-your-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Is-sucralose-the-safer-sweetener-for-your-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2370ca57-2814-4070-8405-a4ff57239b0f Tue, 19 Sep 2023 23:37:00 -0400 Is sucralose the safer sweetener for your gut health?
